706297f-a.text:
(1)
Plana Street, from Flatbush to Vanderbilt Aves., showing the Brook. lyn Riding and Driving Club. The building in the foreground, is nos
uused as a commercial garage.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also Flatbush Ave., east side, north of Plana
Street.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, showing the Vanderbilt Ave., side of the Brooklyn Riding
and Driving Club.
Auguet 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
